name: Get Status
author: getstatus

sections.description:
getStatus is a simple DIY to instantly introduce neat “customer area” for clients to have access to project status. Where it stands?, what’s next?, documents, updates and much more

How it works?
1. Create your projects within getStatus – feel free to choose your milestones, put your logo and projects background.
2. Invite your customers. They will be choosing a password to have secured access to the specific project
3. Embed into your website via getStatus plugins (login and project shortcodes)
4. Communicate with your customer via getStatus app – send emails, text messages, upload documents, progress milestones and much more.

List of shortcakes:
1. Login Shortcode
2. Project Shortcode
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/getstatus directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the getStatus screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/getstatus directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the getStatus screen to configure the plugin

Do I need an account with getStatus?

Yes, you will need to sign-up first at http://getStatus.online

Are all parameters required?

No, please check plugin dashboard for list of shortcodes and required parameters.

upgrade_notice.0.1: Upgrade notices describe the reason a user should upgrade. No more than 300 characters.
